fullgame.name: Minesweeper & Dungeon RPG - 扫雷与地下城

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12+
  • Processor:
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb video memory or higher
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, 2.4 Ghz or higher / Apple M1 or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb video memory or higher
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

name: Minesweeper & Dungeon RPG: DEMO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1 Gigahertz(GHz) or faster
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb video memory or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11 64-bit
  • Processor: 1 Gigahertz(GHz) or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb video memory or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
